text: The move to join this training was a life changer for me! Very patient instructors, you cannot just not know it.

text: I landed an internship position as a react developer a few weeks after graduating, from zero knowledge of coding!

text: Just to put it simply, my journey into tech started here. I am glad I took action. With that strong foundation, I am presently mastering my backend now.
